import React from 'react' import {SelectedDetailsState} from '../Context/SelectedDetails' const PaymentPage = () => { const {selectedPlan} = SelectedDetailsState(); return (
Complete Payment
Enter your credit or debit card details
Order Summary
Plan Name
{selectedPlan.name}
Billing Cycle
{selectedPlan.period}
Plan price
₹{selectedPlan.price}/mo
) } export default PaymentPage
